description.text:
[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Donate-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=paypal&color=007CB1[/img][/url]
Awakened Weakaura Pack fully localized for all languages

includes a spire activation announcer for tanks aswell as a tank debuffed and tank entering tracker

[color=red]
Blood of the corruptor seems to always prioritise leaving a void below him so there is no super accurate way to show placing below players CD
[/color]

If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1.
If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/sharedmedia_causese


Special thanks for the coding help to the Weakauras discord especially asakawa!

Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].
If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
description.html: Awakened Weakaura Pack fully localized for all languages includes a spire activation announcer for tanks aswell as a tank debuffed and tank entering tracker Blood of the corruptor seems to always prioritise leaving a void below him so there is no super accurate way to show placing below players CD If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1. If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/sharedmedia_causese Special thanks for the coding help to the Weakauras discord especially asakawa! Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate
